abstract: Some video buffs may want to relay their high-definition programming all over the house or take it with them on the road.
snippet: Some video buffs may want to relay their high-definition programming all over the house or take it with them on the road.
lead_paragraph: Some video buffs may want to relay their high-definition programming all over the house or take it with them on the road. Pinnacle Systems addresses that urge with the PCTV to Go HD Wireless.

headline.main: Blend a PC Into Your TV System, Using Wireless and High Definition
headline.print_headline: Blend a PC Into Your TV System, Using Wireless and High Definition
